Purpose: Verify that an empty input string returns a sum of 0.
Verify that the input string "0" returns a sum of 0.
Verify that the input string "1,2" returns a sum of 3.
Verify that the input string "-1,2" throws a runtime error.
Verify that the input string "1\n2,3" returns a sum of 6 after removing the newline delimiter.
Verify that the input string "1,1001" returns a sum of 1, ignoring numbers greater than 1000.
Verify that the input string "//;\n1;2" returns a sum of 3 after removing custom delimiters.
Verify that the input string "//[]\n12***3" returns a sum of 6 with a custom multi-char delimiter.
Verify that the input string "-1,-2,3" throws a runtime error with all negatives listed.
Verify that the input string "1001,2,1002" returns a sum of 2, ignoring all numbers over 1000.
Verify that the input string "1\n2,3" returns a sum of 6 with mixed delimiters.
